title: Build a Netflix Clone with React
summary: Create a stunning Netflix clone using React for the frontend. You'll learn how to fetch data from an API and create a dynamic user interface.

title: Build a Recipe App with Vue.js
summary: This tutorial walks you through building a complete recipe application using Vue.js, Vue Router, and Vuex for state management.

title: SmolCSS - Simple, Modern CSS
summary: A collection of minimal, modern CSS snippets for common web components. A great resource for learning modern CSS techniques.
